question: Which sport's governing body has approved USD 1.5 billion worth Covid-19 Relief Plan, to support its community?
explanation:
The ruling council of FIFA, the highest governing body of football, has unanimously approved the Covid-19 Relief Plan worth USD 1.5 billion.
To help the football community across the world, the plan has been launched, which aims to provide one million dollars grant to each of the 211 member associations. A lumpsum of USD 500,000 is to be provided for supporting women's football.
